entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. entry.title: callmiahmed/smart-dark-mode-extension: Smart Dark Mode Extension A lightweight browser extension that intelligently enables dark mode on websites. It automatically detects the website's theme and switches to a dark theme to reduce eye strain and improve readability, especially in low-light environments. Easy to install and customize for a better browsing experience.
entry.content: Smart Dark Mode Extension A lightweight browser extension that intelligently enables dark mode on websites. It automatically detects the website's theme and switches to a dark theme to reduce eye strain and improve readability, especially in low-light environments. Easy to install and customize for a better browsing experience.
